BVR kill chain: Modified 5th-gen with indigenous Elbit C4I suite, AN/APG-81 AESA radar (200+ km detection), and internal 4-6 AIM-120D/Rampage bays for stealthy BVR; sensor fusion and MADL/Link-16 enable cooperative kills with G550 CAEW cueing to 200 km envelope; 75 operational across 4 squadrons (e.g., 140th at Hatzerim), with 25 more on order toward 100 total. F2T2EA: AN/APG-81 Find/Fix fusion; Tracks network; Targets AIM-120D; Engage 5th gen; Assess sensor fusion.
Associated products: Elbit C4I suite, AN/APG-81 AESA radar, AIM-120D AMRAAM, G550 CAEW

BVR kill chain: Upgraded with AN/APG-82(V)1 / AN/APG-70 radars (200-250 km), conformal tanks, and 8-10 AIM-120D loads for long-range BVR; Bedek / Baz Meshupaz refits (2025) add EW fusion; across 4 squadrons (e.g., 69th at Hatzerim, 133rd at Tel Nof), excels in lofted launches with 200 km effective via sat-links. F2T2EA: AN/APG-82 Find/Fix large volume; Tracks conformal; Targets AIM-120D; Engage lofted; Assess EW fusion.
Associated products: AN/APG-82(V)1 AESA, AIM-120D AMRAAM, conformal tanks, EW suite

BVR kill chain: Block 52+/40 with Elta EL/M-2032 AESA (200 km), fly-by-wire, and 6-8 AIM-120D loads for agile BVR; Spice 1000 / Barak 2020 mods (complete 2025) enhance ECCM/datalink; 204 across 6 squadrons (e.g., 101st at Ramon), core for networked 180 km engagements with Green Pine cueing. BVR kill chain: CAEW with EL/I-2085 AESA radar (400 km horizon) for off-board targeting and mid-course AIM-120 updates; 103rd Squadron at Nevatim, critical kill-chain enabler (2 more ordered 2024) for F-35/F-15 salvos to 200 km. X-Band AESA radar for multi-target tracking and long-range detection; offered for export fighters like Tejas Mk1A (first batches 2025); integrates with Israeli avionics for BVR enhancement. F2T2EA: AESA Find/Fix on Gripen/Tejas; Tracks multiple; Targets cueing; Engage BVR missiles; Assess ESM.

BVR kill chain: Advanced self-protection suites for F-16I, including EW jammers and AESA components; $80M contract 2025 equips fleet for enhanced survivability in contested airspace. F2T2EA: Sub-systems Find/Fix F-16I/F-35I; Tracks cueing; Targets helmet BVR; Engage shots; Assess Israeli.

AESA-equipped loyal wingman for F-35I relay and BVR extension; concept demonstrator for future swarm ops. F2T2EA: AESA nose Find for F-35I; Tracks relay; Targets Derby-ER; Engage internal future; Assess BVR relay.
